name: === SOUNDNESS VERIFICATION TEST SUITE ===
description: Comprehensive test cases for Suvorov-Lomazova soundness verification

name: ✓ SOUND: Simple Workflow
description: Basic sound workflow (Start → Task → End). Passes all properties P1, P2, P3.

name: ✓ SOUND: Sequential Workflow
description: Sequential workflow with data variables. Sound - passes P1, P2, P3.

name: ✓ SOUND: Choice Workflow
description: Choice workflow with proper guards. Both branches lead to end. Sound - passes P1, P2, P3.

name: ✓ SOUND: Loop Workflow
description: Workflow with bounded loop (counter < 3). Sound - passes P1, P2, P3.

name: ✓ SOUND: Parallel Workflow
description: Parallel workflow with AND-split/join. Sound - passes P1, P2, P3.

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - Deadlock
description: Violates P1 (Deadlock Freedom): One branch leads to deadlock with no path to final marking.

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - No Final Reachable
description: Violates P1 (Deadlock Freedom): Final state unreachable due to impossible guard (x > 100 but x = 10).

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - Overfinal Marking
description: Violates P2 (No Overfinal Markings): Reachable state has 2 tokens in end place instead of 1.

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - Extra Tokens
description: Violates P2 (No Overfinal Markings): Transition produces 2 tokens but final marking expects 1.

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - Dead Transition
description: Violates P3 (No Dead Transitions): Transition never fires due to conflicting data constraint (x == 5 but x = 10).

name: ✗ UNSOUND: Violation - Unreachable Transition
description: Violates P3 (No Dead Transitions): Transition is structurally unreachable (no incoming arcs).

name: ✗ UNSOUND: P1+P3 Multiple Violations
description: Violates both P1 (Deadlock) and P3 (Dead Transition): Multiple soundness property violations.

name: === ORIGINAL EXAMPLES ===
description: Original test cases from the repository

description: Original test: Soundness violation - deadlock scenario

name: DPN: (P2) Overfinal Marking
description: Original test: Soundness violation - overfinal marking

name: DPN: (P3) Dead Transition
description: Original test: Soundness violation - dead transition

name: DPN: Soundness Control Flow with Guards
description: Original test: Soundness verification with guards and data variables

name: DPN: Digital Whiteboard - Discharge
description: Real-world example: Digital transfer discharge process

name: DPN: Digital Whiteboard - Transfer
description: Real-world example: Digital whiteboard transfer process
